  • My knowledge base

Gamedev

Теги: gamedev 

Frameworks

  • [springs-engine] опенсорсный фреймворк для разработки RTS
  • kyvy.org. The Open Source Python App development Framework
  • Gymnasium is a standard API for [reinforcement-learning], and a diverse collection of reference environments
  • [godot] 2d и 3в игровой движок, редактор и сообщество
  • pyxel - A retro game engine for Python
  • pyxel-snipets Small snippets for the Python retro game engine
  • gamemaker.io free lowcode платформа для разработки 2D-игр

Other engines

  • PICO-8 is a fantasy console for making, sharing and playing tiny games and other computer programs.
  • TIC-80 is a free and open source fantasy computer for making, playing and sharing tiny games.
  • Fancade, the mobile app where you can play thousands of games, or make your own!
  • gamesalad.com nocode gamemaker (payed)
  • stencyl.com nocode gamemaker (free for desctop)
  • scratch.mit.edu nocode редактор и сообщество для обмена идеями и проектами для детей

Drawing tools

  • picoCAD a program to build and texture lowpoly 3D models (payed)
  • blockbench A low-poly 3D model editor (free)
  • pixilart.com online pixelart tool and community
  • Piskel is a free online editor for animated sprites & pixel art

Texts tools

  • inklewriter простая тулза для создания интерактивных текстов
  • twinery аналог посложнее

Other tools

  • Predict Game Economies & Systems Predict the health of your game economy & tokenomics design pre-launch. Continuously re-forecast your game’s long-term economic health post-launch and through live ops.
  • itch.io is a simple way to find and share indie games online for free

Pixelart

  • Liberated Pixel Cup styleguide
  • opengameart.org

History resources

  • List of text-based computer games (wiki)
  • Balance of Power (video game) (wiki)
  • Balance of Power web emulation

Infos, blogs and community

  • gamedeveloper.com новости, блоги и доска вакансий
  • indiegamejams.com доска с расписанием игровых джемов
  • список геймдев-ивентов

Смотри еще:
